com.espertech.esper.jmx.client

Class ConnectorConfigRMIRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.espertech.esper.jmx.client.ConnectorConfigRMIRegistry
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConnectorConfig
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ConnectorConfigRMIRegistrySecure

    public class ConnectorConfigRMIRegistry
extends java.lang.Object
implements ConnectorConfig
    Connector configuration to indicate to use an RMI registry and JMXConnectorServerFactory.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ConnectorConfigRMIRegistry()
      Ctor, sets the default registry port to 1099.
      ConnectorConfigRMIRegistry(int registryPort)
      Ctor.
      ConnectorConfigRMIRegistry(int registryPort, java.lang.String serviceURL)
      Ctor.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ConnectorConfigRMIRegistry

        public ConnectorConfigRMIRegistry()
        Ctor, sets the default registry port to 1099.

      • ConnectorConfigRMIRegistry

        public ConnectorConfigRMIRegistry(int registryPort)
        Ctor.
        Parameters:
        registryPort - is the RMI registry port to use. The connector port is set to the same value.

      • ConnectorConfigRMIRegistry

        public ConnectorConfigRMIRegistry(int registryPort,
                          java.lang.String serviceURL)
        Ctor.
        Parameters:
        registryPort - is the RMI registry port to use.
        serviceURL - is the URL for use by JMXConnectorServerFactory.

      • getConnectorPort

        public int getConnectorPort()
        Returns the connector port to use. This is an optional value and if not set the value defaults to the RMI registry port.
        Returns:
        connector port
